## ResourceManager.getClassByProperty() method

Find the class that owns a given property accessor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClassByProperty(prop: PropertyAccessor): SerializableClass;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

[PropertyAccessor](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyaccessor.md)


</td><td>

Property accessor to search for.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

The `SerializableClass` that declares the property, or `null` if unknown.
